thread.title: This Video Of Donald Trump Playing The Accordion Is Weirdly Brilliant - BuzzFeed News
thread.title_full: This Video Of Donald Trump Playing The Accordion Is Weirdly Brilliant - BuzzFeed News

author: Alice Workman
title: This Video Of Donald Trump Playing The Accordion Is Weirdly Brilliant - BuzzFeed News
text:
View this image › 
Huw Parkinson / Via youtube.com ID: 10326259 2. Award-winning Australian video producer Huw Parkinson has done it again with the amazing “Life Accordion To Trump” mashup . View this image › 
Huw Parkinson / Via youtube.com ID: 10326282 3. Parkinson uses footage of Trump from his press conference earlier in the week and superimposes an accordion onto his hands. View this image › 
Huw Parkinson / Via youtube.com ID: 10326317 4. As Trump gestures wildly, the accordion moves in and out and all around, bellowing loud chords. View this image › 
Huw Parkinson / Via youtube.com ID: 10326266 5. Nothing goes better with a denial that Russia has embarrassing information on you than some jaunty folk music. View this image › 
Huw Parkinson / Via youtube.com ID: 10326286 6. I don’t know about his finger technique but it looks like there is a lot of hot air blowing around. A perfect video metaphor for American politics right now. View this image › 
Huw Parkinson / Via youtube.com ID: 10326329 7. So sit back and soak in the soothing tunes of the Polka President. Coming soon to a bar near you. Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=S65jqrHQi_c . youtube.com ID: 10326221 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com! 
Alice Workman is a political reporter for BuzzFeed News and is based in Canberra. Contact Alice Workman at alice.workman@buzzfeed.com . Got a confidential tip? Submit it here .
